author: m.kalinin
content: I have been recently working on framing the Consensus API design space and here it is, https://hackmd.io/@n0ble/consensus_api_design_space. The plan is to introduce this doc on tomorrow's call and plan a discussion session on the next week Thursday at 13:00 UTC (right before the consensus layer call). Everybody are welcome to comment and make other inputs on that!
